title: Best of The Program | Guests: Kim Klacik, Julio Rosas, & Drew Hernandez | 8/21/20
description:
GOP congressional candidate Kim Klacik joins after her ad went viral for showing how little black lives really matter to the Democrats running Baltimore. Julio Rosas, senior writer at Townhall, discusses how tone-deaf the DNC is for pushing gun control and defunding the police at the same time. Lives Matter host Drew Hernandez has the truth about the man who was violently knocked out by Antifa in Portland.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
